projects.title: News App
projects.description: News webapp Build with React,Bootstrap. We can read daily news in each category using this app. This Application is Built using News API. For Routing purposes, we use react-router.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: Weather web app built with React, Weather API. Users can see weather data by typing the name of the place.

projects.title: Qr Code Generator
projects.description: Qr Code Generator Build with React. Users can generate a QR code of any URL.
